First of all, the prices weren't lower in any cases although you advertised the information like that. Then, I expected the show to start on time, but it turned out that I had to wait 45 minutes. Moreover, when the play started at last, I couldn't look at the actors. EspeciallyIn particular I was disappointed by Danny Brook, who made me nervous with his lack of talent.

According to your advertisement, there was aan possibilityopportunity to have dinner in your restaurant, but I was surprised when I found it closed. After that, I should also mention, that this evening was dull, boring and the worst in my life.
I am looking forward to hearing from you and I insist that you refund my lost money at once.
